meanings.definition: Bartends: to work as a bartender
meanings.sent1: She bartends at the local pub every Friday night.
meanings.sent2: He bartends at a fancy cocktail lounge in the city.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it bartends at the water bowl, serving imaginary drinks to its reflection.
meanings.sent4: Time bartends the moments of our lives, pouring out memories like a skilled bartender.
meanings.sent5: The sun bartends the day, mixing light and shadows in the sky.

meanings.definition: Bartends: third person singular present of bartend
meanings.sent1: He bartends while his friend plays the guitar at the party.
meanings.sent2: She bartends at the event, making sure everyone has a drink in hand.
meanings.sent3: The robot bartends with precision, never spilling a drop of liquid.
meanings.sent4: The wind bartends the leaves, swirling them in a graceful dance.
meanings.sent5: Music bartends the emotions, stirring hearts with its melody.
